casebody.data:
No. 1556,

Misc.

Forman et al. v. City of Montgomery. William M. Kunstler, Arthur Kinoy, Martin M. Berger, John E. Thorne, Joseph Levin and Charles S. Conley for petitioners. Matthis W. Piel and Walter J. Knabe for respondent.

C. A. 5th Cir. Certiorari denied.

Mr. Justice Douglas is of the opinion that certiorari should be granted.
